roleset.name: agree
roleset.note: AGREE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls correspond-36.1-1. Refer to 'say' for handling of fronted and inverted forms. (from agree.01-v)

AGREEMENT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to agree.01. VN class correspond-36.1-1. FN classes make_agreement_on_action, be_in_agreement_on_action, and be_in_agreement_on_assessment. Framed by Katie. (from agreement.01-n)

example.name: infinitival proposition
example.text: A federal bankruptcy court judge agreed *trace* to extend until March 8, 1990, the period in which the steel, aerospace and energy products company has the exclusive right to file a reorganization plan.
example.arg: *trace* to extend until March 8, 1990, the period in which the steel, aerospace and energy products company has the exclusive right to file a reorganization plan.

example.name: SBAR proposition
example.text: The group agreed that it wouldn't make an offer unless it had Georgia Gulf's consent.
example.arg: that it wouldn't make an offer unless it had Georgia Gulf's consent

example.name: NP proposition
example.text: The Stamford, CT, concern has agreed to a buy-out by Bank of Boston.
example.arg: to a buy-out by Bank of Boston

example.name: with co-agreer
example.text: Usually John agrees with Mary on everything.

example.name: If both agreeing parties are mentioned together, they are arg 0
example.text: any House-Senate agreement on the deficit-reduction legislation

example.name: Args 1 and 2
example.text: a confidentiality agreement with Dunkin ' Donuts

role.descr: what is agreed to, agreeable to what?

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: He seemed agreeable to a game of pool.
